entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -20.6°C

Visibility: 24.1 km

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending after midnight then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023
